nodes.bodyText: Is there a better way to do this? This it totally nebulous.
It felt the most intuitive way to have a different display for each amount. I could always reduce the "customization" for less code?
You can create a similar algorithm without hand-picked slots

This could just be my opinion but the checkerboard pattern for player heads just seems strange. I don't see any reason for it as it just increases the number of pages required to display a full team due to the excess padding.

I think the teams should use some logic to spread them evenly but like you say I'm sure some math can be done for this.
Seems like the algorithm would just start in the upper left hand corner and skip a slot?
Why not just let them see their stats? My thought was if they disable stats it won't automatically display at the end of the match, but if they really want to see it, by all means let them.
That makes sense, ill remove this code from the command
We can't depend on this because it's nms. Use a WeakHashMap with Boolean values.
Is there no simpler way to get an audience so you can call send warning? Kinda liked how most of the menu stuff no longer relies on MatchPlayer at all
Should probably check for permission too here
